main event: A bright silver saucer was observed standing on its edge, surrounded by smoke or haze in Oklahoma City.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 20 minutes,The sighting was categorized as a ground-visual observation,The object appeared to be a probable weather balloon,The report stems from Project Blue Book, which was dedicated to investigating UFO sightings,The sighting raised questions about whether it was an aircraft or something astronomical.
witness description: No specific witnesses were mentioned in the report
